q: of the company, and providing business leadership, and even reportedly mediating in disputes between the founders over issues such as bedrooms on the company jet. In a company statement, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey for a long time to come. Tellingly, on a Twitter posting at the time of the announcement, Eric Schmidt commented;`` Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!'' Google also announced results for Q4,

The game belonged to Allen Iverson . Allen Iverson scored a career playoff-high 45 points, including 19 in the third quarter, as the Philadelphia 76ers overcame Reggie Miller 's 41 points, beating the Indiana Pacers 116-98 Tuesday night to even their first-round series at 1-1. Game 3 of the best-of-five Eastern Conference quarterfinals is Saturday in Indiana.`` I'm going to remember this game for a long time, said Allen Iverson , who also had nine assists.`` I've been playing a lot off my God-given ability. This game took a lot of thinking. I'm pleased with my mental aspect coming into the game

, well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against`` rumours.''
